description: The CS:GO Masters Championship is one of the most prestigious tournaments in the esports calendar. Top teams from around the world will compete for the coveted title and a massive prize pool of $250,000.
The Worlds Qualifiers is the gateway to the pinnacle of League of Legends competition. Teams from various regions will clash for a chance to secure their spot in the prestigious Worlds tournament.
The International Invitational is the crown jewel of Dota 2 esports. Featuring the best teams from around the globe, this tournament offers an unprecedented prize pool of $1,000,000.
